#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  std::unique_lock<std::recursive_mutex> lck(mtx_);
  string op_id = to_string(oid);
  auto it1 = events.find(op_id);
  if (it1 == events.end()) {
    events.insert({op_id, Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>()});
  }
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(op_id);
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> s1 = s; 
  RaftServer& raftSvr = this->GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t term, index;
  bool is_leader;
  raftSvr.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
  if(is_leader) {
    raftSvr.Start(s1, &index, &term);
    {
      events[op_id]->Wait(1000000); // 1 sec wait
      if (events[op_id]->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      } else {
        if (std::find(executed_opids.begin(), executed_opids.end(), op_id) != executed_opids.end()) {
          return KV_SUCCESS;
        } else {
          return KV_TIMEOUT;
        }
      }
    }
  } else {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  std::unique_lock<std::recursive_mutex> lck(mtx_);
  string op_id = to_string(oid);
  auto it1 = events.find(op_id);
  if (it1 == events.end()) {
    events.insert({op_id, Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>()});
  }
  Log_info("Append called with oid = %s, k = %s, v = %s", op_id.c_str(), k.c_str(), v.c_str());
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(op_id);
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> s1 = s; 
  RaftServer& raftSvr = this->GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t term, index;
  bool is_leader;

  raftSvr.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
  if(is_leader) {
    raftSvr.Start(s1, &index, &term);
    events[op_id]->Wait(1000000); // 1 sec wait
    if (events[op_id]->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    } else {
      if (std::find(executed_opids.begin(), executed_opids.end(), op_id) != executed_opids.end()) {
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      } else {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }
  } else {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  std::unique_lock<std::recursive_mutex> lck(mtx_);
  string op_id = to_string(oid);
  Log_info("Get called with oid = %s, k = %s", op_id.c_str(), k.c_str());
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(op_id);
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(*v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> s1 = s; 
  RaftServer& raftSvr = this->GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t term, index;
  bool is_leader;

  raftSvr.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
  if(is_leader) {
    Log_info("Serber with svr-id=%d Get called with oid = %s, k = %s", raftSvr.loc_id_, op_id.c_str(), k.c_str());
    raftSvr.Start(s1, &index, &term);
    {
      auto it1 = events.find(op_id);
      if (it1 == events.end()) {
        events.insert({op_id, Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>()});
      }
      events[op_id]->Wait(1000000); // 1 sec wait
      if (events[op_id]->status_ != Event::TIMEOUT) {
        if (std::find(executed_opids.begin(), executed_opids.end(), op_id) != executed_opids.end()) {
          *v = operations.find(k)->second;  // get the value from the hashmap
          return KV_SUCCESS;
        } else {
          return KV_TIMEOUT;
        }
      } else {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }
  } else {


    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  string op = v->data_[0];
  string op_type = v->data_[1];
  string k = v->data_[2];
  RaftServer& raftSvr = this->GetRaftServer();
  if (op_type == "put") {
    {
      Log_info("Server with svr-id=%d Came to onNextCommand with marshallable opid=%s op_type=%s, key=%s, value=%s", raftSvr.loc_id_, op.c_str(), op_type.c_str(), v->data_[2].c_str(), v->data_[3].c_str());
      string value = v->data_[3];
      auto it = operations.find(k);
      if (it != operations.end()) {
        it->second = value;
        executed_opids.push_back(op);
      } else {
        operations[k] = value;
        executed_opids.push_back(op); 
      }
      Log_info("3.. ");
      auto it1 = events.find(op);
      if (it1 != events.end()) {
        events[op]->Set(1);
      }
      Log_info("4.. ");
    }
  } else if (op_type == "append") {
    {
      Log_info("Server with svr-id=%d Came to onNextCommand with marshallable opid=%s op_type=%s, key=%s, value=%s", raftSvr.loc_id_, op.c_str(), op_type.c_str(), v->data_[2].c_str(), v->data_[3].c_str());
      string value = v->data_[3];
      auto it = operations.find(k);
      if (it != operations.end()) { 
        it->second = it->second + value;
        executed_opids.push_back(op);
      } else {
        operations[k] = value;
        executed_opids.push_back(op);
      }
      auto it1 = events.find(op);
      if (it1 != events.end()) {
        events[op]->Set(1);
      }
    } 
  } else if (op_type == "get") {
    {
      Log_info("Server with svr-id=%d Came to onNextCommand with marshallable opid=%s op_type=%s, key=%s, value=%s", raftSvr.loc_id_, op.c_str(), op_type.c_str(), v->data_[2].c_str(), operations.find(k)->second.c_str());
      string value = operations.find(k)->second;
      v->data_[3] = value;
      executed_opids.push_back(op);
      auto it1 = events.find(op);
      if (it1 != events.end()) {


        events[op]->Set(1);
      }
    }
  }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
